entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Watrous
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watrous 6:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets near midnight. Blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
